system.description:
"Whispered code, unleashed within arm's reach."

You have an advanced Brainiac unit implant with enough power to function as a hacking rig, but it isn't as powerful as a normal hacking rig and has shorter range. You may make Spellcasting (Hacking) actions within Very Close and at -2 on your rolls.

Requires ™ Base Unit.
